channel.title: RE: great newb quetions
channel.description:
ok this might sound funny but i need tp know what a host is and wat it does get my no-ip to show up instead of me having to use 0.0.0.0 unlimited access to my server even when im off te computer and its off auto restart that restarts and saves every 30mins and the code so every1 can see this Owner Jalapeno842 has jus logged in and a working pickup command for slipknotscape and some1 to check to see if they can get on this server ip 0.0.0.0 hopefully itll bring u to my server which is from the source slipknotscape(i did not leech i even remodeled some stuff and about to do more)
plz answer all my questions
what is dedicated hosting is it 24/7 server online thing
Lagex said this:The ip 0.0.0.0 connects to my server for me. It's called localhost and only the owner can connect to it. If owners run their servers, if they try to connect, they need to have a localhost ip or use no ip at all. If I connect to 0.0.0.0 it goes to my server.
how do i get my no-ip to be able to use as that 0.0.0.0 thing so other ppl can use my server

well can u get me a dedicated hosting
can u give me the link for the codes

item.title: RE: great newb quetions
item.dc:creator: @gs1 gs
item.description:
@gs1 wrote:

[quote=“jalapeno842, post:1, topic:198830”]get my no-ip to show up instead of me having to use 0.0.0.0 = make an account at no-ip.com and make a no-ip and that logs to your server

unlimited access to my server even when im off te computer and its off = when cpu is off? impossible the run.bat must stay on

auto restart that restarts and saves every 30mins = some servers download with an auto restarter if voule works for you it doesnt for me i just use windows mouse recorder its more complicated tho

and the code so every1 can see this Owner Jalapeno842 has jus logged in
and a working pickup command for slipknotscape = there is a tutorial for it i could give you but you wouldnt know what to do with it

some1 to check to see if they can get on this server ip 0.0.0.0 hopefully itll bring u to my server = it will not…

what is dedicated hosting is it 24/7 server online thing = it means they keep it on all the time[/quote]

Read full topic

ok one is how do i get my server to stay up 24/7 without my comp on
my localhost for my server is 0.0.0.0 but thats only for me i wanna no how do i make my no-ip usable as my server ip so every1 else can use my server
i want a working pickup command for slipknotscape
i want the code so wen i log in it says Owner Jalapeno842 has loggged in
i want the auto restarter code that restarts server every 30min and saves
and thats pretty much it
